View Javadoc

1   package org.lindbergframework.persistence.impl;
2   
3   import javax.sql.DataSource;
4   
5   import org.lindbergframework.persistence.sql.LinpPreparedStatementSetter;
6   import org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException;
7   import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
8   import org.springframework.jdbc.core.PreparedStatementSetter;
9   import org.springframework.jdbc.core.SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor;
10  import org.springframework.jdbc.support.rowset.SqlRowSet;
11  
12  /**
13   * lindberg spring jdbcTemplate extension that uses
14   * LinpPreparedStatementSetter as PreparedStatementSetter implementation.
15   *  
16   * @author Victor Lindberg
17   *
18   */
19  public class LinpSpringJdbcTemplate extends JdbcTemplate{
20  	
21  	public LinpSpringJdbcTemplate(DataSource dataSource){
22  		super(dataSource);
23  	}
24  	
25  	/**
26  	 * {@inheritDoc}
27  	 */
28  	public int update(String sql, Object... params) throws DataAccessException {
29  		return update(sql, createPreparedStatementSetter(sql, params));
30  	}
31  	
32  	/**
33  	 * {@inheritDoc}
34  	 */
35  	public SqlRowSet queryForRowSet(String sql, Object... params) throws DataAccessException {
36  		return (SqlRowSet) query(sql, createPreparedStatementSetter(sql, params), new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor());
37  	}
38  
39  	/**
40  	 * Create lindberg PreparedStatementSetter implementation for specified sql and parameters.
41  	 * 
42  	 * @param sql sql for PreparedStatementSetter.
43  	 * @param params parameters for PreparedStatementSetter.
44  	 * @return lindberg PreparedStatementSetter implementation for specified sql and parameters.
45  	 */
46  	protected PreparedStatementSetter createPreparedStatementSetter(String sql, Object... params){
47  	   return new LinpPreparedStatementSetter(sql,params);	
48  	}
49  
50  }
